page.title: 08Social Concerns
page.content: People in Rusper have a few complaints about the village.,{transport}is one of them.Although a bus goes to Horshan every day,it is very infrequent.The {traffic}through the village at certain times of the day is noisy,causes congestion and is sometimes dangerous. Another thing which is very annoying to some people is {aeroplane noise.}Up to 10 planes an hour fly over the village as it is on the direct flypath from Gatwick Airport. When it is a hot day they like to have their windows open and sometimes listen to the radio or watch television,if a plane goes by they can hardly hear anything.Some people who have lived there for a long time say they have got used to it.There is{only one food {shop}and that does not sell meat.Only people who do not own cars seem to mind this.
